name: Techna ⚬ Alpha 2.0
description:
It is an approach to creating a new theme for visual novels in order to make the experience as immersive as possible. 

At its current state, you may finish exploring the project within 10 minutes.

Features   ⚬

⚬   8D Music Background
⚬   Music Room
⚬   High-Quality Images

Versions   ⚬

⚬   Version 2.0: August 30, 2021 (Details)
⚬   Version 1.0: August 25, 2021 -

We built a prototype according to our first plan which is to create a story within a story after went through learning how to create mobile and desktop screens, etc. We probably would implement a chatting feature between you and/or the protagonist with the characters that might be present in the future. Our goal is to provide an immersive experience to the readers by the feeling of being part of the storyline. 

S P O I L E R: The storyline acts as a placeholder, not a spoiler.
More from Roomah Gaming  ⚬
